definition: to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil

sentences.english: Amid all the pomp and celebration, one of the darker aspects to the wedding was how thin she was too.
sentences.chinese: 圍繞着盛況和慶典，美中不足的一點是，新娘太瘦了。

sentences.english: The scene of the GREs held at Harvard.
sentences.chinese: 這是哈佛大學舉辦GRE考試的盛況。

sentences.english: Last year saw brands embracing innovative online video campaigns like never before.
sentences.chinese: 就在去年，各廠商紛紛擁抱創新視頻營銷，盛況空前。

sentences.english: Every goat year, waves of pilgrims come to the Holy Lake. It is really an exceptionally grand occasion.
sentences.chinese: 每逢羊年轉湖的朝聖者人流如潮，盛況空前。

sentences.english: The 52 performances saw thousands of audience, which was the first time in history.
sentences.chinese: 先後52場的演出，觀衆達數十萬人，盛況空前。

sentences.english: Now, let us look at the event bubble tea bar.
sentences.chinese: 現在，就讓我們去看看泡沫紅茶的盛況吧。

sentences.english: Patriotic bunting as a frigid display of archaic pomp?
sentences.chinese: 愛國旗幟在呆板地展示古代的盛況？

sentences.english: Some New Yorkers watched the spectacle from chartered boats.
sentences.chinese: 許多紐約市民在特許船隻上觀看了這一盛況。

sentences.english: HBO will show the event on TV on Sunday at 7 p.m.
sentences.chinese: HBO電視臺將於本週日晚7點開始直播慶典盛況。

sentences.english: This is the workroom in all its splendor.
sentences.chinese: 漪歟盛哉，這是工作室的盛況。

sentences.english: The Opening Ceremony will be televised on Cable TV.
sentences.chinese: 有線電視將實況轉播開幕式的盛況。

sentences.english: How does a pleb like me know about the best hotel on Sardinia?
sentences.chinese: 我這樣的草民怎會有機會知道撒丁島頂級酒店的盛況？

definition: the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
to get together all at once
meeting place/place where people gather/CL:個|个[ge4]
to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
to observe and emulate/to study (esp. following sb's example)
one after another/in succession/one by one/continuously/diverse/in profusion/numerous and confused/pell-mell
